title: Game crashes 13seconds in
body:
Every single game... a few seconds after moving the game crashes (regardless of mode).

Windows 10  v1607  build 14393.187
EVGA GTX 1070 FE  Drive 21.21.13.6909

replies.body: I am having the same issue and I have no idea what is causing it

I fixed my issue with it. I recently moved my setup and I wasn't getting enough power to my computer so my game would always crash a couple seconds into the game. All I did was make sure i had my computer plugged in directly to a wall instead of having it pulled into a power strip. I hope this helps :)

Do you see a specific error message or behavior when the crash occurs? Something like a bugsplat or network connection error? With a bit more detail, I can provide the right steps to take in order to solve this.

Please confirm if your symptoms are similar
